name: Guidelines for the Book of Changes
name_original: Guidelines for the Book of Changes
description:
Explore the threads of fate and interpret the mists of the inner self. "Guidelines for the Book of Changes" lights your way forward. Deeply rooted in the philosophical wisdom of the ancient Chinese "Book of Changes", this game perfectly blends classic hexagrams with modern interactive experiences, taking you on an extraordinary "divination" journey.

Here, money hexagrams are no longer simple predictions of good or bad luck, but a bridge for you to listen to yourself and gain insight into your inner world. Each cast of the hexagrams is a deep reflection on your life and a dialogue with your soul. We do not promote feudal superstitions, nor do we blindly worship fate. "Guidelines for the Book of Changes" aims to guide you in finding inner balance and strength amidst the complexities of life, navigating the unknown with wisdom and facing challenges with courage.

"Guidelines for the Book of Changes" is not just a game, but a profound experience about oneself, life, and philosophical reflection. Now, let's embark on this journey together to explore the light within.
